SummaryEnglish: 27-year-old Tokyo office worker Mire Yoshizuki just returned to Japan, 22-year-old fourth-year college student Sora Nagase aspires to be a teacher, and 20-year-old boyish, part-time Hiroshima okonomiyaki shop worker and freelancer Reika Kawatani. What draws together these three women from completely different walks of life is a magic gem.
